AzureBlade nods and takes a seat in front of Blackstorm.

AzureBlade: Yggdrasil, I'll contact her spark. Be prepared to welcome 
her... if I can convince her.

He slowly enters into a trance and sends warm emission at 
Nightlight's spark. He waits for a reaction before beginning to talk.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackStorm:
> 
> BlackStorm remains un councious on the lab table. The program was 
> quiet and witout act.
